alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:49AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hubbard, south central Beltrami, northeastern Becker and southeastern Clearwater Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Itasca, or 26 miles southwest of Bemidji, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bemidji, Park Rapids, Akeley, Nevis, Lake George, Lavinia and Laporte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Hubbard; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
